task.title: Attach the AC/DC power cord
task.shortdesc: How to attach the power cord to the Valusinâ„¢ 10" ring light.

ul.li: The DC connector is the cylindrical plug.
The DC jack jack can be found on the lower right-hand side of the ring light base, if the ring light buttons are facing you.

step.cmd:
Plug the DC connector into the DC jack on the ring light.
One hand is holder the base of the ring light while the other hand plugs in the DC jack at the base of the light.
